file_content.text: Our scanning data will change how House Thul deals with the Killiks.
Here's your equipment. Is that everything you need to rebuild the map of the Killik tunnels?
Yes, it's all here! Thank you!
I'll upload the maps to the Empire right away. Then we'll rest here a bit.
I can't take Yudin Thul's abuses. Not yet.
At least our friends' sacrifice wasn't for nothing.
Please find our scans. We'll be safe here.
I thought we were finished, my lord. So many insects....
We're on the same side, sir. House Thul sent us.
You're working for the Empire, right? Us, too.
I knew someone would find us. So many bugs....
My team entered the cave. Then the Killiks... bursting, screeching, slashing. We barely escaped!
If you're here on Yudin Thul's orders, he isn't happy with your delay.
Are you the lost researchers?
Yudin Thul... that, that cold-hearted... he told us this area was safe.
Killiks or not, you won't last long this far from civilization.
This area isn't safe.
I know. We're only here because a Thul noble ordered us. "A peaceful mission," he said.
What were you doing here?
How's your team doing?
I was lucky, but my team suffered some deep wounds. And I lost one man.
Stop whimpering!
I'm sorry. I'm just a researcher.
We were sent to investigate ruins. One minute we're scanning the site, the next... the Killiks attacked.
Before they struck, our scans detected the insects' tunnel network. It was huge. The Killiks could be scurrying beneath us right now!
If they're underfoot, all the easier to crush them beneath my heel.
The Killiks don't scare me.
Yes, my lord. But having maps of their warrens will only help our cause.
Any louder and they may burst through the ground and devour you whole.
Then you better quiet down.
You're right. But those scans--with diagrams of the Killik tunnels, House Thul could finally avoid their ambushes.
A map of the Killik warrens would be advantageous. Did you save your findings?
Where are these scans?
I backed them up, right before the attack.
I know a few Imps who'd pay for a map of the Killiks' transportation network.
Those scans sound valuable.
Exactly. With knowledge of the Killik tunnels, we'd finally be able to avoid those bugs.
Why wait around?
Don't you see? Our scans contained diagrams of the Killik tunnels. House Thul could use that intel to avoid the bugs' traps for good.
You're pathetic.
Please. I'd be long gone, but those scans of the Killik tunnels could give House Thul the edge it needs.
My partner had the sensor equipment. We ran, he was right behind me... then he was gone.
Now our scans are lost in the warrens. If you're going that way for Yudin, maybe you could get our data, too?
Now our scans are somewhere in the warrens. Please, could you find them?
I'll take care of it.
I knew you'd salvage our mission. I knew it!
The Killiks can't hope to win.
I'm--we're all grateful.
Our sensors are in the Killik tunnels. We'll need all the pieces to verify the maps, but I know you can find them.
You fetch it. [Refuse quest]
We didn't fare too well the first time. We can't go back.
Killiks... everywhere.
